thread.section_title: FreedomVoice Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FreedomVoice | www.freedomvoice.com
thread.title: Douglas Waldman

author: Douglas Waldman
title: Douglas Waldman
text: we got tired of sending out letters that were ignored, and the letters costing probably $2.50 each to produce. now, we produce the letters in our software, save them as pdf's, and send them. freedom voice more than pays for itself !.. also, when our office is closed, we forward our fax machine to our Freedom Voice number, so we don't miss any critical documents. and, if you get a lot of really big faxes, you can review them in Freedom Voice before deciding whether to print them or discard them.
